TopicTitle: Did this ever make it beyond close dev?

Articles.Content: This mod seemed really interesting combining both a pod and a spaceplane as a unified unit. But seems like the dev decided to abandon it or at least never make it public. Had anyone seen it outside of discussions?
it's now a part of the contares mod i belive
Thanks, was looking there but could see any that were similar in design... though those space planes are rather interesting to use.

there are mods located in other areas!  

Please tell me this isn't common.
